1">a08e02ec47410200e90d87e8dee4905a</std_change_producer_version> <sys_class_name>std_change_proposal</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>beth.anglin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-07-01 10:09:08</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>0a4b0e2c47410200e90d87e8dee49047</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2015-07-01 10:22:04</sys_updated_on> <task_effective_number>STDCHG0000003</task_effective_number> <template_name>Add network switch to datacenter cabinet</template_name> <template_value>short_description=Add network switch to cabinet^description=This standard change template describes adding a new network switch to a datacenter cabinet^implementation_plan=-- Physically rack switch in top of cabinet -- Ensure that redundant power supply is connected to the backup power circuit in the cabinet -- Ensure that first GBIC fibre connector (Gi0/1) connects to primary distribution switch -- Ensure that second GBIC fibre connector (Gi1/1) connects to secondary distribution switch -- Connect console port to cabinet management console -- Add switch to network management console -- Add switch to network monitoring console -- Add switch to ServiceNow CMDB ^backout_plan=-- Physically remove switch and all associated cabling -- Remove switch from management, monitoring and ServiceNow CMDB^test_plan=-- Run connectivity tests by connecting laptop to copper interface -- Ensure that switch is showing as healthy in network monitoring console^EQ</template_value> <time_worked/> <universal_request/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </std_change_proposal> </record_update>
